name: _Storing
description: Action to describe store-in or store-out

columns.name: _performedAt
columns.description: Reference to the Location the Action was performed at

columns.name: _actionTimeType
columns.description: Enum stating the type of the Action

columns.name: _servedActivity
columns.description: Reference to the Activity the Action was performed for

columns.name: _checks
columns.description: References to the CheckActions performed on the object

columns.name: _storedObjects
columns.description: Reference to the Objects being stored in or stored out

columns.name: _storingType
columns.description: Enum stating whether the StoringAction describes the store-in or the store-out

columns.name: _contactPersons
columns.description: References to Actors (Person; NonHumanActor) acting as contacts

columns.name: _otherIdentifiers
columns.description: Details about any other identifier; depending on the context of use

columns.name: _actionEndTime
columns.description: DateTime holding the end time of the Action

columns.name: _actionStartTime
columns.description: DateTime holding the start time of the Action

columns.name: _skeletonIndicator
columns.description: Indicator whether a logistics object is a skeleton object

columns.name: _storagePlaceIdentifier
columns.description: Short text stating the exact place of storage
